about_the_game:
Scenes from the Heart is a Visual Novel about a mature but lonely boy (you) who struggles to connect with others due to his superiority complex. His life changes when he befriends Chisaki Namichi, who faces bullying for her unique eye color at elementary school. Together, they later discover Konaka Motomi, a new transferred classmate with her own quirks.

As they bond, Konaka introduces improvisation theater to Chisaki and you. Inspired, Chisaki initiates her long dream of a visual novel development project, involving the player and Konaka. Despite initial conflicts during the process, they succeed and win an award for their demo, as a menacing shadow is watching over them, hinting at challenges ahead...

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

The story will be split into two parts:

Part 1 is more like a prologue to introduce the starting point and the main cast.

Part 2 will be diving deeper into everyday life and branching the story at a certain point.

[ Scenes from the Heart is also my first game and Visual Novel ever, so naturally there will be some flaws included most likely, but those I aim to fix on Part 2, which I planned to be developed later if (and when) its Kickstarter-campaign succeeds. ]

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

  • Achievements (both in-game & Steam achievements) + gallery to see all of them.

  • 3 languages available for the text: English, Finnish and Japanese

  • Changing title screen's background image (changes at certain "check" points as you progress through the story)

  • 2 endings for the story

  • English VO

  • Real-life philosophies

  • 2 Easter Eggs hidden on the story and can be spotted from the backgrounds
